title: Empirical investigation of multi-source cross-validation in clinical ECG classification
details: T Leinonen, D Wong, A Vasankari, A Wahab… - Computers in Biology and …, 2024
abstract: Traditionally, machine learning-based clinical prediction models have been trained and evaluated on patient data from a single source, such as a hospital. Cross- validation methods can be used to estimate the accuracy of such models on new …
